pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kidney Failure Risk Equation (KFRE) Tools // Implements the Kidney Failure Risk Equation (KFRE; Tangri and colleagues (2011) doi:10.1001/jama.2011.451; Tangri and colleagues (2016) doi:10.1001/jama.2015.18202) to compute 2- and 5-year kidney failure risk using 4-, 6-, and 8-variable models. Includes helpers to append risk columns to data frames, classify chronic kidney disease (CKD) stages and end-stage renal disease (ESRD) outcomes, and evaluate and plot model performance.
